content.title: 1. Kukkuvaggo
content.gatha1: Diyaḍḍhakukkū udayena kaṇṇikā, vidatthiyo aṭṭha parikkhipanti naṃ;
content.gathalast: Sā siṃsapāsasiṃsapāsasiṃsapāsā sīsapāyā siṃsapāyā siṃsapāyā siṃsapā sāramayā apheggukā, kuhiṃ ṭhitā upparitouparitouparitouparito na dhaṃsati.
content.gatha1: Yā tiṃsati sāramayā anujjukā, parikiriyapakiriyā gopāṇasiyo samaṃ ṭhitāsamaṭṭhitāsamaṭṭhitā ;
content.gathalast: Tāhi susaṅgahitā balasā pīḷitātā saṅgahitā balasā ca pīḷitātāhi susaṅgahitā balasā ca pīḷitātāhi saṅgahītā balasā ca pīḷitā , samaṃ ṭhitā upparito na dhaṃsati.
content.gatha1: Evampi mittehi daḷhehi paṇḍito, abhejjarūpehi sucīhi mantibhi;
content.gathalast: Susaṅgahīto siriyā na dhaṃsati, gopāṇasī bhāravahāva kaṇṇikā.
content.gatha1: Kharattacaṃ bellaṃ yathāpi satthavā, anāmasantopi karoti tittakaṃ;
content.gathalast: Samāharaṃ sāduṃ karoti patthiva, asāduṃ kayirā tanubandhamuddharaṃtanuvaṭṭamuddharaṃtanuvaṭṭamuddharaṃ .
content.gatha1: Evampi gāmanigamesu paṇḍito, asāhasaṃ rājadhanāni saṅgharaṃ;
content.gathalast: Dhammānuvattī paṭipajjamāno, sa phāti kayirā aviheṭhayaṃ paraṃ.
content.gatha1: Odātamūlaṃ sucivārisambhavaṃ, jātaṃ yathā pokkharaṇīsu ambujaṃ;
content.gathalast: Padumaṃ yathā agginikāsiphālimaṃ, na kaddamo na rajo na vāri limpati.
content.gatha1: Evampi vohārasuciṃ asāhasaṃ, visuddhakammantamapetapāpakaṃ;
content.gathalast: Na limpati kammakilesa tādiso, jātaṃ yathā pokkharaṇīsu ambujanti.
content.gatha1: Yathā cāpo ninnamati, jiyā cāpi nikūjati;
content.gathalast: Haññate nūna manojo, migarājā sakhā mama.
content.gatha1: Handa dāni vanantāni, pakkamāmi yathāsukhaṃ;
content.gathalast: Netādisā sakhā honti, labbhā me jīvato sakhā.
content.gatha1: Na pāpajanasaṃsevī, accantaṃ sukhamedhati;
content.gathalast: Manojaṃ passa semānaṃ, giriyassānusāsanīariyassānusāsanīariyassānusāsanīariyassānusāsanī .
content.gatha1: Na pāpasampavaṅkena, mātā puttena nandati;
content.gathalast: Manojaṃ passa semānaṃ, acchannaṃsacchannaṃ samhi lohite.
content.gatha1: Evamāpajjate poso, pāpiyo ca nigacchati;
content.gathalast: Yo ve hitānaṃ vacanaṃ, na karoti atthadassinaṃ.
content.gatha1: Evañca so hoti tato ca pāpiyo, yo uttamo adhamajanūpasevī;
content.gathalast: Passuttamaṃ adhamajanūpasevitaṃ seviṃ (syā.), migādhipaṃ saravaraveganiddhutaṃ.
content.gatha1: Nihīyati puriso nihīnasevī, na ca hāyetha kadāci tulyasevī;
content.gathalast: Seṭṭhamupagamaṃ mupanamaṃ (sī. pī. a. ni. 3.26) udeti khippaṃ, tasmāttanā uttaritaraṃtasmā attano uttariṃtasmā attano uttariṃtasmā attano uttaraṃ bhajethāti.
content.gatha1: Rājā te bhattaṃ pāhesi, suciṃ maṃsūpasecanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Maghadevasmiṃmakhādevasmiṃmakhādevasmiṃmāghadevasmiṃ adhivatthe, ehi nikkhamma bhuñjassu.
content.gatha1: Ehi māṇava orena, bhikkhamādāya sūpitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tvañca māṇava bhikkhā ca bhakkhosi (syā.), bhakkhāva (ka.), ubho bhakkhā bhavissatha.
content.gatha1: Appakena tuvaṃ yakkha, thullamatthaṃ jahissasi;
content.gathalast: Bhikkhaṃ te nāharissanti, janā maraṇasaññino.
content.gatha1: Laddhāya yakkhāladdhāyaṃ yakkhaladdhāyaṃ yakkhaladdhāyaṃ yakkha tava niccabhikkhaṃ, suciṃ paṇītaṃ rasasā upetaṃ;
content.gathalast: Bhikkhañca te āhariyo naro idha, sudullabho hehiti bhakkhite khādite (sī. syā. pī.) mayi.
content.gatha1: Mamevamamesamamesa sutano attho, yathā bhāsasi māṇava;
content.gathalast: Mayā tvaṃ samanuññāto, sotthiṃ passāhi mātaraṃ.
content.gatha1: Khaggaṃ chattañca pātiñca, gacchamādāyagacchevādāyagacchevādāyagacchevādāya māṇava;
content.gathalast: Sotthiṃ passatu te mātā, tvañca passāhi mātaraṃ.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ yakkha sukhī hohi, saha sabbehi ñātibhi;
content.gathalast: Dhanañca me adhigataṃ, rañño ca vacanaṃ katanti.
content.gatha1: Te kathaṃ nu karissanti, vuddhā giridarīsayā;
content.gathalast: Ahaṃ baddhosmi pāsena, nilīyassa vasaṃ gato.
content.gatha1: Kiṃ gijjha paridevasi, kā nu te paridevanā;
content.gathalast: Na me suto vā diṭṭho vā, bhāsanto mānusiṃ dijo.
content.gatha1: Bharāmi mātāpitaro, vuddhe giridarīsaye;
content.gathalast: Te kathaṃ nu karissanti, ahaṃ vasaṃ gato tava.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ nu gijjho yojanasataṃ, kuṇapāni avekkhati;
content.gathalast: Kasmā jālañca pāsañca, āsajjāpi na bujjhasi.
content.gatha1: Yadā parābhavo hoti, poso jīvitasaṅkhaye;
content.gathalast: Atha jālañca pāsañca, āsajjāpi na bujjhati.
content.gatha1: Bharassu mātāpitaro, vuddhe giridarīsaye;
content.gathalast: Mayā tvaṃ samanuññāto, sotthiṃ passāhi ñātake.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ luddaka nandassu, saha sabbehi ñātibhi;
content.gathalast: Bharissaṃ mātāpitaro, vuddhe giridarīsayeti.
content.gatha1: Anutīracārī bhaddante, sahāyamanudhāva maṃ;
content.gathalast: Mahā me gahitorohito maccho, so maṃ harati vegasā.
content.gatha1: Gambhīracārī bhaddante, daḷhaṃ gaṇhāhi thāmasā;
content.gathalast: Ahaṃ taṃ uddharissāmi, supaṇṇo uragāmivauragammivauragammivauragammiva .
content.gatha1: Vivādo no samuppanno, dabbhapuppha suṇohi me;
content.gathalast: Samehi medhagaṃmedhakaṃ samma, vivādo vūpasammataṃ.
content.gatha1: Dhammaṭṭhohaṃ pure āsiṃ, bahū aḍḍā me tīritābahuaṭṭaṃ me tīritaṃbahuaṭṭaṃva tīritaṃbahu atthaṃ me tīritaṃ ;
content.gathalast: Samemi medhagaṃ samma, vivādo vūpasammataṃ.
content.gatha1: Anutīracāri naṅguṭṭhaṃ, sīsaṃ gambhīracārino;
content.gathalast: Accāyaṃathāyaṃathāyaṃ majjhimo khaṇḍo, dhammaṭṭhassa bhavissati.
content.gatha1: Cirampi bhakkho abhavissa, sace na vivademase;
content.gathalast: Asīsakaṃ anaṅguṭṭhaṃ, siṅgālo harati rohitaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yathāpi rājā nandeyya, rajjaṃ laddhāna khattiyo;
content.gathalast: Evāhamajja nandāmi, disvā puṇṇamukhaṃ patiṃ.
content.gatha1: Kathaṃ nu thalajo santo, udake macchaṃ parāmasi;
content.gathalast: Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kathaṃ adhigataṃ tayā.
content.gatha1: Vivādena kisā honti, vivādena dhanakkhayā;
content.gathalast: Jīnā uddā vivādena, bhuñja māyāvi rohitaṃ.
content.gatha1: Evameva manussesu, vivādo yattha jāyati;
content.gatha2: Dhammaṭṭhaṃ paṭidhāvanti, so hi nesaṃ vināyako;
content.gathalast: Dhanāpi tattha jīyanti, rājakoso pavaḍḍhatīti ca vaḍḍhati (pī.).
content.gatha1: Paṇṇakaṃdasaṇṇakaṃdasaṇṇakaṃdasaṇṇakaṃ tikhiṇadhāraṃ, asiṃ sampannapāyinaṃ;
content.gatha2: Parisāyaṃ puriso gilati, kiṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
content.gathalast: Yadaññaṃ dukkaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito.
content.gatha1: Gileyya puriso lobhā, asiṃ sampannapāyinaṃ;
content.gatha2: Yo ca vajjā dadāmīti, taṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
content.gathalast: Sabbaññaṃ sukaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, evaṃ jānāhi maddava māgadha (sī. syā. pī.).
content.gatha1: Byākāsi āyuro pañhaṃ, atthaṃatthaatthaattha dhammassa kovido;
content.gatha2: Pukkusaṃ dāni pucchāmi, kiṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
content.gathalast: Yadaññaṃ dukkaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito.
content.gatha1: Na vācamupajīvanti, aphalaṃ giramudīritaṃ;
content.gatha2: Yo ca datvā avākayirā, taṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
content.gathalast: Sabbaññaṃ sukaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, evaṃ jānāhi maddava.
content.gatha1: Byākāsi pukkuso pañhaṃ, atthaṃ dhammassa kovido;
content.gatha2: Senakaṃ dāni pucchāmi, kiṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
content.gathalast: Yadaññaṃ dukkaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito.
content.gatha1: Dadeyya puriso dānaṃ, appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ;
content.gatha2: Yo ca datvā nānutappetapetape , taṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
content.gathalast: Sabbaññaṃ sukaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, evaṃ jānāhi maddava.
content.gatha1: Byākāsi āyuro pañhaṃ, atho pukkusaporiso;
content.gathalast: Sabbe pañhe atibhoti, yathā bhāsati senakoti.
content.gatha1: Vibbhantacitto kupitindriyosi, nettehi te vārigaṇā savanti;
content.gathalast: Kiṃ te naṭṭhaṃ kiṃ pana patthayāno, idhāgamā brahme tadiṅghabrāhmaṇa iṅghabrāhmaṇa iṅgha brūhi.
content.gatha1: Miyyetha bhariyā vajato mamajja, agacchato maraṇamāha yakkho;
content.gathalast: Etena dukkhena pavedhitosmi, akkhāhi me senaka etamatthaṃ.
content.gatha1: Bahūni ṭhānāni vicintayitvā, yamettha vakkhāmi tadeva saccaṃ;
content.gathalast: Maññāmi te brāhmaṇa sattubhastaṃ, ajānato kaṇhasappo paviṭṭho.
content.gatha1: Ādāya daṇḍaṃ parisumbha bhastaṃ, passeḷamūgaṃ uragaṃ dujivhaṃdijivhaṃdijivhaṃ ;
content.gathalast: Chindajja kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitāni, bhujaṅgamaṃ passa pamuñca bhastaṃ.
content.gatha1: Saṃviggarūpo parisāya majjhe, so brāhmaṇo sattubhastaṃ pamuñci;
content.gathalast: Atha nikkhami urago uggatejo, āsīviso sappo phaṇaṃ karitvā.
content.gatha1: Suladdhalābhā janakassa rañño, yo passatī senakaṃ sādhupaññaṃ;
content.gathalast: Vivaṭṭachaddovivattacchaddovivaṭṭacchadovivaṭṭacchaddā nusi sabbadassī, ñāṇaṃ nu te brāhmaṇa bhiṃsarūpaṃ.
content.gatha1: Imāni me sattasatāni atthi, gaṇhāhi sabbāni dadāmi tuyhaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tayā hi me jīvitamajja laddhaṃ, athopi bhariyāya makāsi sotthiṃ.
content.gatha1: Na paṇḍitā vetanamādiyanti, citrāhi gāthāhi subhāsitāhi;
content.gathalast: Itopi te brahme dadantu vittaṃ, ādāya tvaṃ gaccha sakaṃ niketanti.
content.gatha1: Yeme ahaṃ na jānāmi, aṭṭhisena vanibbake;
content.gathalast: Te maṃ saṅgamma yācanti, kasmā maṃ tvaṃ na yācasi.
content.gatha1: Yācako appiyo hoti, yācaṃ adadamappiyo;
content.gathalast: Tasmāhaṃ taṃ na yācāmi, mā me videssanāviddesanāviddesanā ahu.
content.gatha1: Yo ve yācanajīvāno, kāle yācaṃ na yācati;
content.gathalast: Parañca puññāpuññaṃpuññaṃ dhaṃseti, attanāpi na jīvati.
content.gatha1: Yo ca yo ve (ka.) yācanajīvāno, kāle yācañhi yācatiyācaṃpi yācatiyācāni yācatiyācati yācanaṃyācati yācanaṃyācanaṃ yācati ;
content.gathalast: Parañca puññaṃ labbheti, attanāpi ca jīvati.
content.gatha1: Na ve dessantina ve dussantina ve dissantina videssantina videssanti sappaññā, disvā yācakamāgate;
content.gathalast: Brahmacāri piyo mesi, vada tvaṃvara taṃvara tvaṃ bhaññamicchasiyaññamicchasi .
content.gatha1: Na ve yācanti sappaññā, dhīro ca veditumarahati;
content.gathalast: Uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhanti, esā ariyāna yācanā.
content.gatha1: Dadāmi te brāhmaṇa rohiṇīnaṃ, gavaṃ sahassaṃ saha puṅgavena;
content.gathalast: Ariyo hi ariyassa kathaṃ na dajjā, sutvāna gāthā tava dhammayuttāti.
content.gatha1: Yattha verī nivasati, na vase tattha paṇḍito;
content.gathalast: Ekarattaṃ dirattaṃ vā, dukkhaṃ vasati verisu.
content.gatha1: Diso ve lahucittassa, posassānuvidhīyato;
content.gathalast: Ekassa kapino hetu, yūthassa anayo kato.
content.gatha1: Bālova ca (sī. syā. pī.) paṇḍitamānī, yūthassa parihārako;
content.gathalast: Sacittassa vasaṃ gantvā, sayethāyaṃpassethāyaṃ yathā kapi.
content.gatha1: Na sādhu balavā bālo, yūthassa parihārako;
content.gathalast: Ahito bhavati ñātīnaṃ, sakuṇānaṃva cetakoceṭako .
content.gatha1: Dhīrova balavā sādhu, yūthassa parihārako;
content.gathalast: Hito bhavati ñātīnaṃ, tidasānaṃva vāsavo.
content.gatha1: Yo ca sīlañca paññañca, sutañcattani passati;
content.gathalast: Ubhinnamatthaṃ carati, attano ca parassa ca.
content.gatha1: Tasmā tuleyya mattānaṃ, sīlapaññāsutāmivasīlaṃ paññaṃ sutaṃpiva ;
content.gathalast: Gaṇaṃ vā parihare dhīro, eko vāpi paribbajeti.
content.gatha1: Dvāsattati gotamabho gotama puññakammā, vasavattino jātijaraṃ atītā;
content.gathalast: Ayamantimā vedagū brahmapattibrahmupapattibrahmupapatti , asmābhijappanti janā pajā (ka.) anekā.
content.gatha1: Appañhi etaṃappañca hetaṃappaṃsi etaṃ na hi dīghamāyu, yaṃ tvaṃ baka maññasi dīghamāyuṃ;
content.gathalast: Sataṃ sahassānisahassānaṃsahassānaṃsahassānaṃsahassānaṃsahassānaṃsahassānasahassāna nirabbudānaṃ, āyuṃ pajānāmi tavāha brahme.
content.gatha1: Anantadassī bhagavāhamasmi, jātijjaraṃ sokamupātivatto;
content.gathalast: Kiṃ me purāṇaṃ vatasīlavattaṃ sīlavantaṃ (pī. ka.), ācikkha me taṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ tvaṃ apāyesi bahū manusse, pipāsite ghammani samparete;
content.gathalast: Taṃ te purāṇaṃ vatasīlavattaṃ, suttappabuddhova anussarāmi.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ eṇikūlasmi janaṃ gahītaṃ, amocayī gayhaka niyyamānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Taṃ te purāṇaṃ vatasīlavattaṃ, suttappabuddhova anussarāmi.
content.gatha1: Gaṅgāya sotasmiṃ gahītanāvaṃ, luddena nāgena manussakappā;
content.gatha2: Amocayi tvaṃ balasā pasayha, taṃ te purāṇaṃ vatasīlavattaṃ;
content.gathalast: Suttappabuddhova anussarāmi.
content.gatha1: Kappo ca te baddhacaropatthacaropaṭṭhacaro ahosi, sambuddhimantaṃsambuddhivantaṃsambuddhivantaṃsambuddhavantaṃ vatinaṃvatitaṃvatidaṃ amaññaṃ;
content.gathalast: Taṃ te purāṇaṃ vatasīlavattaṃ, suttappabuddhova anussarāmi.
content.gatha1: Addhā pajānāsi mametamāyuṃ, aññampi jānāsi tathā hi buddho;
content.gathalast: Tathā hi tāyaṃtyāyaṃ jalitānubhāvo, obhāsayaṃ tiṭṭhati brahmalokanti.
content.gatha1: Varakaṇṇika cāpavaro sutano, atha gijjha sarohitamacchavaro;
content.gathalast: Puna paṇṇakadasaṇṇakadasaṇṇakadasaṇṇaka senaka yācanako, atha veri sabrahmabakena dasāti.
content.title: 2. Gandhāravaggo
content.gatha1: Hitvā gāmasahassāni, paripuṇṇāni soḷasa;
content.gathalast: Koṭṭhāgārāni phītāni, sannidhiṃ dāni kubbasi.
content.gatha1: Hitvā gandhāravisayaṃ, pahūtadhanadhāriyaṃ dhāniyaṃ (sī. pī.), dhaññanti attho;
content.gathalast: Pasāsanatopasāsanitopasāsanitopasāsanāto nikkhanto, idha dāni pasāsasi.
content.gatha1: Dhammaṃ bhaṇāmi vedeha, adhammo me na ruccati;
content.gathalast: Dhammaṃ me bhaṇamānassa, na pāpamupalimpati.
content.gatha1: Yena kenaci vaṇṇena, paro labhati ruppanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Mahatthiyampi ce vācaṃ, na taṃ bhāseyya paṇḍito.
content.gatha1: Kāmaṃ ruppatu vā mā vā, bhusaṃva vikirīyatu;
content.gathalast: Dhammaṃ me bhaṇamānassa, na pāpamupalimpati.
content.gatha1: No ce assa sakā buddhi, vinayo vā susikkhito;
content.gathalast: Vane andhamahiṃsovaandhamahisovaandhamahisova careyya bahuko jano.
content.gatha1: Yasmā ca panidhekacce, āceramhiācāramhiācāramhi susikkhitā;
content.gathalast: Tasmā vinītavinayā, caranti susamāhitāti.
content.gatha1: Attānaṃ saṅkamaṃ katvā, yo sotthiṃ samatārayi;
content.gathalast: Kiṃ tvaṃ tesaṃ kimekimokimokiṃ me tuyhaṃ, honti eteheteso te mahākapi.
content.gatha1: Rājāhaṃ issaro tesaṃ, yūthassa parihārako;
content.gathalast: Tesaṃ sokaparetānaṃ, bhītānaṃ te arindama.
content.gatha1: Ullaṅghayitvāsa laṅghayitvāsulaṅghayitvā attānaṃ, vissaṭṭhadhanuno sataṃ;
content.gathalast: Tato aparapādesu, daḷhaṃ bandhaṃ latāguṇaṃ.
content.gatha1: Chinnabbhamiva vātena, nuṇṇonunno rukkhaṃ upāgamiṃ;
content.gathalast: Sohaṃ appabhavaṃ tattha, sākhaṃ hatthehi aggahiṃ.
content.gatha1: Taṃ maṃ viyāyataṃ santaṃ, sākhāya ca latāya ca;
content.gathalast: Samanukkamantā pādehi, sotthiṃ sākhāmigā gatā.
content.gatha1: Taṃ maṃ na tapate bandho, mato vadho (sī. syā. pī.) me na tapessati;
content.gathalast: Sukhamāharitaṃ tesaṃ, yesaṃ rajjamakārayiṃ.
content.gatha1: Esā te upamā rāja, taṃ suṇohi arindama atthasandassanī katā (pī.);
content.gatha2: Raññā raṭṭhassa yoggassa, balassa nigamassa ca;
content.gathalast: Sabbesaṃ sukhameṭṭhabbaṃ, khattiyena pajānatāti.
content.gatha1: Ambāhamaddaṃ vanamantarasmiṃ, nīlobhāsaṃ phalitaṃphalinaṃ saṃvirūḷhaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tamaddasaṃ phalahetu vibhaggaṃ, taṃ disvā bhikkhācariyaṃ carāmi.
content.gatha1: Selaṃ sumaṭṭhaṃ naravīraniṭṭhitaṃnaravidduniṭṭhitaṃ , nārī yugaṃ dhārayi appasaddaṃ;
content.gathalast: Dutiyañca āgamma ahosi saddo, taṃ disvā bhikkhācariyaṃ carāmi.
content.gatha1: Dijā dijaṃ kuṇapamāharantaṃ, ekaṃ samānaṃ bahukā samecca;
content.gathalast: Āhārahetū paripātayiṃsu, taṃ disvā bhikkhācariyaṃ carāmi.
content.gatha1: Usabhāhamaddaṃ yūthassa majjhe, calakkakuṃ vaṇṇabalūpapannaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tamaddasaṃ kāmahetu vitunnaṃ, taṃ disvā bhikkhācariyaṃ carāmi.
content.gatha1: Karaṇḍakokaraṇḍunāmakaraṇḍunāma kaliṅgānaṃ, gandhārānañca naggaji;
content.gathalast: Nimirājā videhānaṃ, pañcālānañca dummukho;
Ete raṭṭhāni hitvāna, pabbajiṃsu akiñcanā.
content.gatha1: Sabbepime devasamā samāgatā, aggī yathā pajjalito tathevime;
content.gathalast: Ahampi eko carissāmi bhaggavi, hitvāna kāmāni yathodhikāni.
content.gatha1: Ayameva kālo na hi añño atthi, anusāsitā me na bhaveyya pacchā;
content.gathalast: Ahampi ekā carissāmi bhaggava, sakuṇīva muttā purisassa hatthā.
content.gatha1: Āmaṃ pakkañca jānanti, atho loṇaṃ aloṇakaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tamahaṃ disvāna pabbajiṃ, careva tvaṃ carāmahanti.
content.gatha1: Ahaṃ ce daḷhadhammassadaḷhadhammāya , vahanti nābhirādhayiṃ;
content.gathalast: Dharantī urasi sallaṃ, yuddhe vikkantacārinī.
content.gatha1: Nūna rājā na jānāti , mama vikkamaporisaṃ;
content.gathalast: Saṅgāme sukatantāni, dūtavippahitāni ca.
content.gatha1: Sā nūnāhaṃ marissāmi, abandhu aparāyinīaparāyiṇīaparāyaṇī ;
content.gathalast: Tadā hitathā hi kumbhakārassa, dinnā chakaṇahārikā.
content.gatha1: Yāvatāsīsatī poso, tāvadeva pavīṇati;
content.gathalast: Atthāpāye jahanti naṃ, oṭṭhibyādhiṃva khattiyo.
content.gatha1: Yo pubbe katakalyāṇo, katattho nāvabujjhati;
content.gathalast: Atthā tassa palujjanti, ye honti abhipatthitā.
content.gatha1: Yo pubbe katakalyāṇo, katattho manubujjhati;
content.gathalast: Atthā tassa pavaḍḍhanti, ye honti abhipatthitā.
content.gatha1: Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddantebhaddaṃ vobhaddaṃ vobhaddaṃ vo , yāvantettha samāgatā;
content.gathalast: Sabbe kataññuno hotha, ciraṃ saggamhi ṭhassathāti.
content.gatha1: Yo maṃ pure paccuḍḍetipaccudetipaccudetipaccudetipaccuṭṭheti , araññe dūramāyato;
content.gathalast: So na dissati mātaṅgo, somadatto kuhiṃ gato.
content.gatha1: Ayaṃ vā so mato seti, allapiṅkava chijjitoallapiṅkava chijjitoallasiṅgaṃva vacchitoallapītaṃva vicchito ;
content.gathalast: Bhumyā nipatito seti, amarā vata kuñjaro.
content.gatha1: Anagāriyupetassa, vippamuttassa te sato;
content.gathalast: Samaṇassa na taṃ sādhu, yaṃ petamanusocasi.
content.gatha1: Saṃvāsena have sakka, manussassa migassa vā;
content.gathalast: Hadaye jāyate pemaṃ, taṃ na sakkā asocituṃ.
content.gatha1: Mataṃ marissaṃ rodanti, ye rudanti lapanti ca;
content.gathalast: Tasmā tvaṃ isi mā rodi, roditaṃ moghamāhu santo.
content.gatha1: Kanditena have brahme, mato peto samuṭṭhahe;
content.gathalast: Sabbe saṅgamma rodāma, aññamaññassa ñātake.
content.gatha1: Ādittaṃ vata maṃ santaṃ, ghatasittaṃva pāvakaṃ;
content.gathalast: Vārinā viya osiñcaṃ, sabbaṃ nibbāpaye daraṃ.
content.gatha1: Abbahī vata me sallaṃ, yamāsi hadayassitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Yo me sokaparetassa, puttasokaṃ apānudi.
content.gatha1: Sohaṃ abbūḷhasallosmi, vītasoko anāvilo;
content.gathalast: Na socāmi na rodāmi, tava sutvāna vāsavāti.
content.gatha1: Kāḷāni kesāni pure ahesuṃ, jātāni sīsamhi yathāpadese;
content.gathalast: Tānajja setāni susīmasusima disvā, dhammaṃ cara brahmacariyassa kālo.
content.gatha1: Mameva deva palitaṃ na tuyhaṃ, mameva sīsaṃ mama uttamaṅgaṃ;
content.gathalast: ‘‘Atthaṃ karissa’’nti musā abhāṇiṃabhāsiṃ , ekāparādhaṃ khama rājaseṭṭha.
content.gatha1: Daharo tuvaṃ dassaniyosi rāja, paṭhamuggato hosihohihoti yathā kaḷīro;
content.gathalast: Rajjañca kārehi mamañca passa, mā kālikaṃ anudhāvī janinda.
content.gatha1: Passāmi vohaṃ dahariṃ kumāriṃ, sāmaṭṭhapassaṃ sutanuṃ sumajjhaṃ;
content.gathalast: Kāḷappavāḷāva pavellamānā, palobhayantīvasā lobhayantīva naresu gacchati.
content.gatha1: Tamena passāmiparena nāriṃ, āsītikaṃ nāvutikaṃ va jaccā;
content.gathalast: Daṇḍaṃ gahetvāna pavedhamānaṃ, gopānasībhoggasamaṃ carantiṃ.
content.gatha1: Sohaṃ tamevānuvicintayanto, eko sayāmi passāmi (ka.) sayanassa majjhe;
content.gathalast: ‘‘Ahampi evaṃ’’ iti pekkhamāno, na gahe ramena gehe ramegehe na ramegehe na rame brahmacariyassa kālo.
content.gatha1: Rajjuvālambanī cesā, yā gehe vasato rati;
content.gathalast: Evampi chetvāna vajanti dhīrā, anapekkhino kāmasukhaṃ pahāyāti.
content.gatha1: Ahaṃ dasasataṃbyāmaṃ, uragamādāya āgato;
content.gathalast: Tañca mañca mahākāyaṃ, dhārayaṃ nappavedhasi na pavedhayi (ka.).
content.gatha1: Athimaṃ khuddakaṃ pakkhiṃ, appamaṃsataraṃ mayā;
content.gathalast: Dhārayaṃ byādhasebyadhasebyathasibyādhasi bhītābhītobhītobhīto , kamatthaṃ koṭasimbalikoṭisimbalikoṭisimbali .
content.gatha1: Maṃsabhakkho tuvaṃ rāja, phalabhakkho ayaṃ dijo;
content.gathalast: Assatthāni ca bhakkhitvā, khandhe me ohadissati.
content.gatha1: Te rukkhā saṃvirūhanti, mama passe nivātajā;
content.gathalast: Te maṃ pariyonandhissanti, arukkhaṃ maṃ karissare.
content.gatha1: Santi aññepi rukkhā se, mūlino khandhino dumā;
content.gathalast: Iminā sakuṇajātena, bījamāharitā hatā.
content.gatha1: Ajjhārūhābhivaḍḍhantiajjhārūḷhābhivaḍḍhantiajjhārūḷhābhivaḍḍhanti , brahantampi vanappatiṃ;
content.gathalast: Tasmā rāja pavedhāmi, sampassaṃnāgataṃ bhayaṃ.
content.gatha1: Saṅkeyya saṅkitabbāni, rakkheyyānāgataṃ bhayaṃ;
content.gathalast: Anāgatabhayā dhīro, ubho loke avekkhatīti.
content.gatha1: Rājā apucchi vidhuraṃ, dhammakāmo yudhiṭṭhilo;
content.gathalast: Api brāhmaṇa jānāsi, ko eko bahu socati.
content.gatha1: Brāhmaṇo ajayūthena, pahūtedho bahūtejo (pī. ka.), bahutendo (syā.) vane vasaṃ;
content.gathalast: Dhūmaṃ akāsi vāseṭṭho, rattindivamatandito.
content.gatha1: Tassa taṃ dhūmagandhena, sarabhā makasaḍḍitāmakasadditāmakasadditāmakasaṭṭitāmakasaṭṭitā ;
content.gathalast: Vassāvāsaṃ upāgacchuṃ, dhūmakārissa santike.
content.gatha1: Sarabhesu manaṃ katvā, ajā so nāvabujjhatha;
content.gathalast: Āgacchantī vajantī vāāgacchanti vajanti vāāgacchanti vajanti vāāgacchantiṃ vajantiṃ vā , tassa tā vinasuṃvinassuṃ ajā.
content.gatha1: Sarabhā sarade kāle, pahīnamakase vane;
content.gathalast: Pāvisuṃ giriduggāni, nadīnaṃ pabhavāni ca.
content.gatha1: Sarabhe ca gate disvā, ajā ca vibhavaṃ gatāaje ca vibhavaṃ gate ;
content.gathalast: Kiso ca vivaṇṇo cāsi, paṇḍurogī ca brāhmaṇo.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ yo saṃ niraṃkatvā, āgantuṃ kurute piyaṃ;
content.gathalast: So eko bahu socati, dhūmakārīva brāhmaṇoti.
content.gatha1: Kodha jāgarataṃ sutto, kodha suttesu jāgaro;
content.gathalast: Ko mametaṃ vijānāti, ko taṃ paṭibhaṇāti me.
content.gatha1: Ahaṃ jāgarataṃ sutto, ahaṃ suttesu jāgaro;
content.gathalast: Ahametaṃ vijānāmi, ahaṃ paṭibhaṇāmi te.
content.gatha1: Kathaṃ jāgarataṃ sutto, kathaṃ suttesu jāgaro;
content.gathalast: Kathaṃ etaṃ vijānāsi, kathaṃ paṭibhaṇāsi me.
content.gatha1: Ye dhammaṃ nappajānanti, saṃyamoti damoti ca;
content.gathalast: Tesu suppamānesu, ahaṃ jaggāmi devate.
content.gatha1: Yesaṃ rāgo ca doso ca, avijjā ca virājitā;
content.gathalast: Tesu jāgaramānesu, ahaṃ suttosmi devate.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ jāgarataṃ sutto, evaṃ suttesu jāgaro;
content.gathalast: Evametaṃ vijānāmi, evaṃ paṭibhaṇāmi te.
content.gatha1: Sādhu jāgarataṃ sutto, sādhu suttesu jāgaro;
content.gathalast: Sādhumetaṃ vijānāsi, sādhu paṭibhaṇāsi meti.
content.gatha1: Na kiratthi anomadassisu, pāricariyā buddhesu appikāappakā ;
content.gathalast: Sukkhāya aloṇikāya ca, passaphalaṃ kummāsapiṇḍiyā.
content.gatha1: Hatthigavassā cime bahūhatthigavāssā ca me bahūhatthī gavāssā cime bahūhatthī gavāssā ca me bahū , dhanadhaññaṃ pathavī ca kevalā;
content.gathalast: Nāriyo cimā accharūpamā, passaphalaṃ kummāsapiṇḍiyā.
content.gatha1: Abhikkhaṇaṃ rājakuñjara, gāthā bhāsasi kosalādhipa;
content.gathalast: Pucchāmi taṃ raṭṭhavaḍḍhana, bāḷhaṃ pītimano pabhāsasi.
content.gatha1: Imasmiññeva nagare, kule aññatare ahuṃ;
content.gathalast: Parakammakaro āsiṃ, bhatako sīlasaṃvuto.
content.gatha1: Kammāya nikkhamantohaṃ, caturo samaṇeddasaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ācārasīlasampanne, sītibhūte anāsave.
content.gatha1: Tesu cittaṃ pasādetvā, nisīdetvānisādetvā paṇṇasanthate;
content.gathalast: Adaṃ buddhāna kummāsaṃ, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi.
content.gatha1: Tassa kammassa kusalassa, idaṃ me edisaṃ phalaṃ;
content.gathalast: Anubhomi idaṃ rajjaṃ, phītaṃ dharaṇimuttamaṃ.
content.gatha1: Dadaṃ bhuñja mā ca pamādodada bhuñja ca mā ca pamādodada bhuñja ca mā ca pamādo , cakkaṃ vattaya kosalādhipa;
content.gathalast: Mā rāja adhammiko ahu, dhammaṃ pālaya kosalādhipa.
content.gatha1: Sohaṃ tadeva punappunaṃ, vaṭumaṃ ācarissāmi sobhane;
content.gathalast: Ariyācaritaṃ sukosale, arahanto me manāpāva passituṃ.
content.gatha1: Devī viya accharūpamā, majjhe nārigaṇassa sobhasi;
content.gathalast: Kiṃ kammamakāsi bhaddakaṃ, kenāsi vaṇṇavatī sukosale.
content.gatha1: Ambaṭṭhakulassa khattiya, dāsyāhaṃ parapesiyā ahuṃ;
content.gathalast: Saññatā ca saññatā (sī. pī.) dhammajīvinī, sīlavatī ca apāpadassanā.
content.gatha1: Uddhaṭabhattaṃ ahaṃ tadā, caramānassa adāsi bhikkhuno;
content.gathalast: Vittā sumanā sayaṃ ahaṃ, tassa kammassa phalaṃ mamedisanti.
content.gatha1: Āgamissati me pāpaṃ, āgamissati me bhayaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tadā hi calitā sākhā, manussena migena vā.
content.gatha1: Bhīruyā nūna me kāmo, avidūre vasantiyā;
content.gathalast: Karissati kisaṃ paṇḍuṃ, sāva sākhā parantapaṃ.
content.gatha1: Socayissati maṃ kantā, gāme vasamaninditā;
content.gathalast: Karissati kisaṃ paṇḍuṃ, sāva sākhā parantapaṃ.
content.gatha1: Tayā maṃ asitāpaṅgihasitāpaṅgihasitāpaṅgihasitāpaṅgi , sitānimihitānimihitānimihitāni bhaṇitāni ca;
content.gathalast: Kisaṃ paṇḍuṃ karissanti, sāva sākhā parantapaṃ.
content.gatha1: Agamā nūna so saddo, asaṃsi nūna so tava;
content.gathalast: Akkhātaṃ nūna taṃ tena, yo taṃ sākhamakampayi.
content.gatha1: Idaṃ kho taṃ samāgamma, mama bālassa cintitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tadā hi calitā sākhā, manussena migena vā.
content.gatha1: Tatheva tvaṃ avedesi, avañciavajjhi pitaraṃ mama;
content.gathalast: Hantvā sākhāhi chādento, āgamissati me te (syā. ka.) bhayanti.
content.gatha1: Varagāma mahākapi bhaggava ca, daḷhadhamma sakuñjara kesavaro;
content.gathalast: Urago vidhuro puna jāgarataṃ, atha kosalādhipa parantapa cāti.
content.gatha1: Atha sattanipātamhi, vaggaṃ me bhaṇato suṇa;
content.gathalast: Kukku ca puna gandhāro, dveva guttā mahesināti.
